sentence: The suite had floor to ceiling windows over looking the ocean a deck with a jacuzi and a full kitchen
A good quality hotel with breathtaking views of the ocean from the rooms
We stayed here for a few nights in one of the end suites go for number 19 on floors 1 6 for a panoramic view out to sea as well as up the coast line
My birthday was the next day and we were seated in a sweeping booth with a sea view for breakfast
We got a room with a beautiful view of the bay
The downstairs bar is fantastic and overlooks the pol beach with lots of comfy alcoves and sofas to curl up in with a coffee or cocktail
Absolutely beautiful hotel with stunning views overlooking Barcelona beach and city

The hotel is super modern we checked into a room overlooking the sea bathroom was pretty nice wet room and spacious room breakfast selection was great we will come back if you have a chance go to the rooftop for a pic
I can recommend this hotel directly next to the beach
Hotel has a fantastic location on the beach
Nope more like too expensive 4star beach and boogie hotel

A fantastic hotel staff go above and beyond the call of duty view to die for this hotel is on the beach a bit out of town so taxi or a 20 min walk to find a bit of life food in hotel very good but a bit pricey has underground parking
The location for us is great not city centre at the end of Barcolenata Beach
Even though it has beach club vibe during the day and a clubby vibe at night it is still family friendly
We requested early check in and a pool sea view room on a high level
While not right in the city like the Meridien property on Las Ramblas it is a great beach getaway while still being in the city and just a beautiful walk to town
We never actually went to the water we just stayed by the pool and looked at the beach

Not great if you have children who wish to swim and the Mediterranean Sea is too cold• They ’re seemingly afraid of people wandering in from the beach and we were stopped several times by hotel staff questioning if we belonged
I requested for higher floor with a nice view before we arrived and I also booked a sea view room
Metro but a nice walk except for the NUDE Beach next door
The hotel is in a great location for spending time on the beach but it is a bit far from most of the tourist destinations in Barcelona
If you are looking for a luxury hotel having a beach fun parties etc
Room was listed as ocean view but is was mostly obstructed by a structure out the window
Additionally you have music booming from the pool deck plus different music from the beach bar which is pretty un relaxing and headache inducing to have to listen to different tunes simultaneously
If you just want to hang out at the beach and walk along the promenade then this location suits you
